lessons.name: Syllogistic Arguments - Find Conclusion
lessons.description: Syllogistic Arguments - Find Conclusion will test if you can find the conclusion in a syllogistic argument.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: You're the cheapest person in Missouri| and
the cheapest person in Missouri doesn't forget professors.| This implies that
you must be talented.| After all,
whoever forgets professors isn't talented.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: Tom is a scholarly professor.| How do I know this? Well,
Tom is clean| and
only those who are clean are scholarly professors.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: Since |prosperous convicts are weak| and
it's false that some weak person is remarkable,| as a result
no remarkable person is a prosperous convict.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: Keith isn't a dishonest soldier.| And
dishonest soldiers aren't cruel.| All this implies that
Keith is faithful| - since we all know that
cruel people are faithful.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: You're the boldest person in Missouri| and
the boldest person in Missouri doesn't hate diabetics.| This implies that
you must be courageous.| After all,
whoever hates diabetics isn't courageous.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: No smart person is brilliant.| For
confused farmers are smart| and
it's false that there is some confused farmer who is brilliant.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: One or more grocers in Missouri must be colorful.| The evidence for this is that
whoever is a grocer in Missouri is bright| and that
some who are bright are colorful.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: It's false that poetic persons are sometimes customers.| This follows from the fact
that not a single customer is poetic.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: The cruelest guitarist is romantic.| We know this because we know that
whoever is a friend of Madonna isn't romantic| and that
the cruelest guitarist isn't a friend of Madonna.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: It is false that there are some virtuous clowns who aren't demented.| So
everyone who is smart must be demented,| in view of the fact that
those who are smart are always virtuous clowns.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: We may conclude that |not all who are talented are judges| - since
judges are dull,| and
those who are dull aren't sociable,| and
at least some who are sociable are talented.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: No frivolous dentists are cautious.
Not all people who are frivolous dentists are rough.| We may conclude that
people who are cautious are sometimes rough.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: Whoever is a realistic prisoner isn't slow.| But
no one is frightened unless he or she is slow.| As a result,
not a single realistic prisoner is frightened.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: Any powerful musician is cheerful.
Not everyone who is wild is a powerful musician.| Hence
not everyone who is wild is cheerful.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: One or more cowardly scientists aren't dishonest.| This proves that
not all who are dishonest are cowardly scientists.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: It is false that there are some mediocre senators who aren't fortunate.| So
everyone who is poor must be fortunate,| in view of the fact that
those who are poor are always mediocre senators.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: David is this gloomy person.| This follows because
David is the roughest pickpocket in Missouri| and
this gloomy person is the roughest pickpocket in Missouri.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: Any polite democrat is naive.
Not everyone who is smart is a polite democrat.| Hence
not everyone who is smart is naive.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: At least some wrestlers in Missouri are cheap.| Thus
some wrestlers in Missouri are demented,| since surely
some cheap persons are demented.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: We may conclude that not |all who are scholarly are terrorists| - since
terrorists are cruel,| and
those who are cruel aren't bashful,| and
at least some who are bashful are scholarly.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: A person isn't a convict unless he or she is generous.| It follows that
only those who are convicts are generous.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: No realistic dentists are gentle.
People who are bright are sometimes gentle.| This shows that
not everyone who is bright is a realistic dentist.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: It is false that there are some remarkable druggists who aren't powerful. |So
everyone who is cheap must be powerful,| in view of the fact that
those who are cheap are always remarkable druggists.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: One or more poets in Missouri must be creative.| The evidence for this is that
whoever is a poet in Mo is mean| and that
some who are mean are creative.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: You aren't bitter| - because
you're the toughest person in Mo| and
the toughest person in Mo hurts plumbers.| Naturally
those who hurt plumbers aren't bitter.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: We may conclude that
not all who are fortunate are bandits| - since
bandits are cheap,| and
those who are cheap aren't hideous, |and
at least some who are hideous are fortunate.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: The wildest customer is mediocre.| We know this because we know that
whoever is a neighbor of Iron Man isn't mediocre| and that
the wildest customer isn't a neighbor of Iron Man.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: You're the brightest person in space| and
the brightest person in space doesn't know hypocrites.| This implies that
you must be miserable.| After all,
whoever knows hypocrites isn't miserable.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: Not all who are naive are slow.| My reason for saying this is that
some who are disgusting are slow| and
those who are naive are never disgusting.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: Relatives of Keith aren't sarcastic.ßÇÅThe cleanest pilot is a relative of Keith.| From this it follows that
the cleanest pilot isn't sarcastic.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: No sociable dentists are terrified.ßÇÅNot all people who are sociable dentists are bold.| We may conclude that
people who are terrified are sometimes bold.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: Whoever is a talented musician isn't slow.| But
no one is careful unless he or she is slow.| As a result,
not a single talented musician is careful.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: One or more vicious pessimists aren't generous.| This proves thatßÇÅ*not all who are generous are vicious pessimists.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: Donna isn't a frightened reporter.| Of courseßÇÅthe boldest person is a frightened reporter.| This proves that
Donna isn't the boldest person.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: Keith can't be remarkable.| I say this for three reasons.
(1) Keith is a scholar.
(2) No scholars are weak.| And finally
(3) none but weak people are remarkable.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: Because |the dullest person is a faithful Cloud watcher,| it must be that
Spider-Man is the dullest person| - since
Spider-Man is a faithful Cloud watcher.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: A person isn't a hideous pickpocket unless he or she is greedy.
Not all who are bold are greedy.| Hence
some who are bold aren't hideous pickpockets.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: At least one banker is frantic,| and
only those who are slow are bankers.| It follows that
some frantic persons are slow.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: Mickey isn't the richest mascot in Florida.| This means that
Mickey can't be this friendly gator,| since
this friendly gator is the richest mascot in Florida.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: At least one smart person is humorous,| and
only those who are smart are professors.| It follows that
some who are humorous are professors.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: It is false that there is some romantic carpenter who isn't poetic.| Therefore
everyone who is strong is poetic,| since
people who are romantic carpenters are always strong.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: Keith isn't a demented soldier.| And
demented soldiers aren't poor.| All this implies that
Keith is terrified| - since we all know that
poor people are terrified.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: A person isn't a careful foreigner unless he or she is sociable.
Not all who are tough are sociable.| Then it must be that
some careful foreigners aren't tough.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: Since |cautious diabetics are short| and
it's false that some short person is vicious,| as a result
no vicious person is a cautious diabetic.

staticQuestions.question: Please find the conclusion in this argument.

answers.answer: No bold person is frivolous.| For
charitable druggists are bold| and
it's false that there is some charitable druggist who is frivolous.
